name: Quintessence (Matazar)
description:
This my submission to the GoGodot Jam 2. It is a small puzzle game that plays with the concept of the fourth wall.

I also wanted to try the combination of 3D and 2D  in a game.

3D models, code and gameplay by myself.

2D assets and sounds by [Canary Games].

Music by Andrey Sitkov.

Inspirations: Undertale, There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension, The Stanley Parable
